name: The Same Coin
description:
A kinetic visual novel originally made for the Global Game Jam (https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/same-coin-3).

Story

It's been a year since Dexter and Shirley have started their relationship; and on their first anniversary, they are revealing their true selves that enable them to love each other more.

Credits

Conceptualization, Story, UI Design, Programming, and Debugging
Benedict "Moonlight Bomber" Villariaza

Character Design and Sprites
Soybaby (http://soybaby.com/)
